Name: Sweet Solitaire. School Witch 2
About the game: Master magical knowledge with the young witch! Dive into the world of magic, spells and potions. Many are not easy puzzles to solve on the way! Levels of varying difficulty will give a few hours of excitement every day, and unique gold cards will make the game even more interesting! - 200 interesting levels - Gather a chain of cards! - Pick up cards faster thanks to the joker - increase the combo multiplier, Which gives you more coins! - Original themed decks and 12 card shirt styles!
